results.advice: Since your banana plant is in the flowering stage with healthy green leaves, focus on supporting fruit set. Make sure the plant gets 10-12 hours of direct sunlight daily and receives 35-40mm of water per week. The ideal temperature is between 26-28 C with 80-85 humidity. Also, ensure the plant has enough potassium and phosphorus, as these nutrients are critical during this stage.
results.translated_advice: Aangesien u piesangplant in die blomstadium met gesonde groen blare is, fokus dit op die ondersteuning van vrugte.Maak seker dat die aanleg daagliks 10-12 uur direkte sonlig kry en 35-40 mm water per week ontvang.Die ideale temperatuur is tussen 26-28 C met 80-85 humiditeit.Sorg ook dat die plant genoeg kalium en fosfor het, aangesien hierdie voedingstowwe van kritieke belang is gedurende hierdie stadium.
